These are great! This is my second pair. They have a nice wide toe box so it doesn’t feel like you toes are being jammed together. The tread on these are a little softer than the ones I bought two years ago, which was a good improvement. I use them as general everyday shoes and for working out( not running). The color on these are more of a very light grey, not a beige which is what I thought they would be but overall a great product for the price!!
the lining at the toes of the left shoe was already separated and i could feel it as soon as i tried it on

So they fit like the original Altra Superiors before Altra decided to ruin their shoes. The uppers looks liek it will hold up, the soles look like they belong on kids shoes.  The recommended shoe size was to long, would recommend 1/2 shorter. I would not hike in them but for a basic zero drop shoe they will do until the sole wear out. I was going to return them for a 12.5 but its not really worth the time of packaging them up and find a UPS drop off box.
Fits good, does the job I need it to, like the colour.
Just got them and anxious to wear

评论概述: Not really wide size as ordered.
评论详情: I ordered a wide size.  Although this style shoe has a wide toe box, the arch and heal is tight. If I loosely tie the laces, they are too short.  By skipping the second from the top eyelet,  problem solved and the shoes are wearable!
These are excellent driving shoes and seem to be holding up well.

评论概述: Good barefoot shoes, but will vary greatly per person
评论详情: First off, a lot of the negative reviews are from people that have no idea what the term "barefoot shoes" means.  These shoes are meant to have very little, if any arch support or sole thickness.  You are SUPPOSED to feel some of the terrain beneath your feet.  So, if you are looking for cushioned, arch supported trail shoes, don't buy barefoot shoes.  Go instead for Topos, Altras, Hoka's or the like, which still offer a wider toe box, but will more padding.Second, many negative reviews site the fact that these shoes go by European sizing.  This shouldn't be a big deal, especially if you know the Euro size that corresponds well to your feet.  I ordered a size 13, and received a Euro size 47, which I know to be the perfect conversion for me.  But, sometimes shoe companies will indeed send a size 46, which is too small for my feet, but fall within the parameters of a typical US size 13.  In that case, I have to return the shoe and get a size up.  So, through trial and error, you just may need to understand the best Euro size for you and deal with it.For a barefoot shoe, I find that they have good side-to-side and heel support, and the tread is more than adequate.  How long the tread will hold up I don't know.  But it's grippy and a non-slip real rubber feel, that is fairly knobby (a good thing).My feet have high arches on the top of my feet, so I always need to loosen my laces so it doesn't cut off the blood and make my toes tingle.  In the case of these shoes, it was still too tight, and I had to remove the shoe inserts altogether.  They are still comfortable (for barefoot shoes) and I will keep using them this way.  They will possibly wear out sooner inside, but that is just a problem I have to deal with.  I would imagine most people won't have this issue and they will be fine.Overall, for the price, I'm perfectly content.  Time will tell if they hold up, and I will update this review accordingly.

This was the first barefoot style shoe I ever bought and I loved them. I’m usually a 10.5 but surprisingly the 10w fit me just fine. I never took them running, let alone trail running, but just for wearing around town and going to the gym, they were great. They are super breathable as well so your feet don’t get hot, but the downside to that is they’re not very good winter shoes lol.  Your feet will feel it if the weather is cold, but otherwise they’re great. The construction is not exactly premium, especially the top around the laces, but it’s good. And the sole, at least for my pair was sturdy and held up well. Still a great shoe even with the downsides. Definitely recommend.
We just bought a second pair of these shoes. They are perfect for my husband's wider feet and very comfortable with breathable material. Definitely his favorite new shoe.
I have very wide feet and these fit me well. They are comfortable to wear all day. The style works with many outfits.
I wear these everywhere when not in office attire.  Probably won’t last but a couple months if you wear everyday. Soles are thin, I had to use custom inserts with more cushion.

By the time I got my calves used to these minimalist shoes, they had holes in the outsole. About 8 months, running about 3 miles per week in them. The ball of my foot also slipped around in the front of the shoe a lot, got hot, and blistered. I have wide feet, but the toe box in these is crazy wide. If it were possible to tighten them, that would help.  Overall, not bad considering the price, but I will try something else next time.
Very comfortable.  I'm incredibly impressed with these, might buy another pair.  Wish they came in half sizes, but half size up fit ok.

I think these shoes are a really good option for people who are really interested in the barefoot shoe style. I wore these pretty much exclusively for a week straight, and when I went to wear a regular pair of tennis shoes, I could feel that my arch had already adjusted to the flat sole. Definitely a good choice for people who wear only barefoot style shoes. Don’t plan on switching between these and regular shoes. They are comfortable for the most part, but you definitely feel the ground beneath your feet. I live in the city and walking on sidewalks you can sometimes feel the hard rubber grips poking into your heel when you land. These would be more comfortable for people who walk on more soft surfaces. Make sure the back of the shoe fits properly because my first pair didn’t and I got a blister from the rubbing on my Achilles tendon.
Great shoes, I wear them every day.
Super comfortable and feels durable. Very happy with the purchase. Highly recommend.

Right when I put them on, they’re comfortable and just right. I have several pairs of this brand. So happy to have found a wide toe box shoe! My only critique (in general of this brand) is the exterior soles be thicker for multiple terrain comfort. You still will not go wrong buying these though. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Nice fit and very comfortable

These wide toe box shoes have been a game changing add. From day one, my foot pain disappeared. The toes from decades of 'regular' toe cramping footwear were finally allowed to open up and relax. These are the second pair of Whitin's I've purchased and I won't be without them.
The color and fit are awesome. I wear them practically everyday, they are extremely comfortable. I don't have the sensory issues with the toe box and weight like I do with regular shoes.

评论详情: I love the Altra Lone Peak, but not their current colors. Also, don't like the "all weather" material...makes absolutely no sense to me.....a low-top trail runner that never dries out if you get water inside. So far I REALLY liking my the price and feel of my Whitin's......we'll see how well they wear.

评论概述: Best replacement I have found for Lems Primal 2
评论详情: I have been heartbroken over the Lems, Primal 2 being discontinued.  The Primal 3 does not even feel like a minimalist shoe and I cant walk 2 miles in them without a blister.  I am a former long distance runner with a bunion and foot issues who converted to minimalist shoes, short distance running, and weights.  The Primal 2 has kept me active and pain free for 7+ years.  I have been trying several brands/styles and these are the closest I have found and they work with my correct toe spacers.  This brand was recommended by a PT.  They look good, feel great, and you can't beat the price.  No breaking in, perfect right out of the box. Thank you!
For me , this will be an all around shoe. Gym, walking, casual footwear. I ordered a pair. Put them on and an hour later ordered 2 more pairs. That's how great they feel.
Product arrives quickly, fit well and shoes are comfortable. For the cost, they are in my opinion best barefoot shoes for cost
I really like these shoes, would be 5 star s but the laces are too short. I needed to loosen mine for a little extra room and it left me with barely enough lace to make a knot.
I always wear size 12 shoes. I ordered size 12. The shoes that arrived were too small.

评论概述: Excellent shoe! Best shoe I've ever had
评论详情: I've tried many minimalist barefoot shoes, this particular shoe is an excellent blend of everything I need. Rugged aggressive tread for hiking.  Extra wide toe box with a canvas top, which means essentially no break-in needed. Comfortable right off the bat!  And of course the zero drop heal makes me feel planted and helps my feet to spread.  They're not flimsy like some other brands of minimalist shoes, they're a good blend of rugged sturdiness but still flexible and grippy.  I am definitely buying more of these in the future!

评论概述: good running shoe but loose fit
评论详情: There wasn’t an inherent issue with the shoe itself. The construction was solid, and the design was lightweight, soft, and delivered the barefoot feel I was specifically looking for. However, the primary reason I decided to return it was due to the fit. I ordered the wide option, but it turned out to be too wide for my preference. It felt slightly loose during my testing, which ultimately led me to feel less secure and comfortable while wearing it. Because of this, I rated the shoe 4 stars instead of 5, as the fit didn’t fully meet my expectations.
I walk a daily average of 3 miles. Totally worn out in 3 months. Poor value for money.

Really like these - I wanted something with a bit more tread for casual hiking and these work. I don't have the issue with digging in at the toes that other have described, but maybe that's because I have short toes. I did have some digging at the back of the ankle, but I just manually bent it a couple times to break it in and no more issue. To be perfect they would be a smidge wider in the toes, but still good.

评论概述: Best shoes for me, I'm not joking
评论详情: These are the best shoes for me and I currently wear them every day. The size fits perfectly, they are barefoot shoes so be clear about that if you buy them.

I finished Grand Canyon 26-mile rim-to-rim hike within a day in these shoes, and they are still in a great shape. I did replace the insoles with Dr. Sxxx Float-On-Air insoles and applied two moleskins to provide some protections. I have tried several low cost combinations in my practice over hundreds of miles, and I found this combination working out the best.

I like them but feet hurt after walking miles. These shoes brand new are not as good as my totally worn out lems primal3. But they're not bad and have better traction than primal3 Lems my favorite

评论概述: Open toe box shoes that feel very light.
评论详情: I Bought these on a whim when i thought they went on sale. They play some gimmicks with the way they price these though, not sure i love that.  The shoes surprised me with how comfortable and light they felt. I took them on about 100 miles in 3 days through new york and then trails and they held up with almost no wear. I guess the best compliment you can have is buying more and i am buying at least one more pair so I have a different color.

These took a little time to break in. They're not super wide, but they do eventually stretch out.  The color is great.  The laces are not so great. They're a bit short and can't hold a knot well so they tend to slip.  They breathe pretty well compared to most knit shoes.  The grip is actually pretty good on these. I find that I slip a lot less than I do in other flat-tread shoes.  The soles are not holding up too well. I wear these about five days per week, and walk about 15-25,000 steps per day. After about two months, the lugs were worn completely off in the shape of my feet.  If you're looking for a cheap barefoot shoe that holds up decently (but not fantastically), these are them.

They're not terrible by any means, but I would gladly have spent twice what these cost to get another pair of the Altras, were they still available in my size.

Sitched out my Columbia boots for these. Yes, im a woman who just couldnt find a woman's shoe that I liked that didnt cost an arm and a leg and thought i would give these a try. I am so happy I did. I have only gone on one hike so far but it was a very rocky challenging hike and my toes didnt hurt once! The bottoms of my left foot felt a little sore the next day but this was a rocky trail in for the most part and these are bare foot shoes but I really do like the way these feel when on the trail. Not sure how these will last as they dont feel super high quality but thats not what I was expecting for the cost and im not a hard core hiker either, so I think this would be a great purchase for a casual hiker who goes like once or twice a month or just an everyday walking shoe. Extremely comfortable.  Ladies, dont be scared that its marketing says mens shoes.

评论概述: Comfortable wear good for Barefoot transitioning
评论详情: This is not really a true barefoot shoe but more of a good transitional shoe, since it still has a bit of toe spring in the front and small bit of foam. But the good part is : it's comfortable to wear , really makes you "feel" the ground more , the shoe is wider than a normal shoe and provides extra toe space. Downsides: you can see where the produces have put glue around the shoe if you pay close attention. I have ran a 5k in these so far and haven't had any problems

Very comfortable. Very good looking. Great value for money. Was going to buy a xero sneakers but found it too pricey. Amazon suggested this brand and found it was similar to xero. Tried it and was NOT disappointed.

评论概述: Not right for me but probably good for others.
评论详情: I have given this product four stars.  The main reason for losing the fifth star is more related to problems with my feet instead of short comings of the product.  My feet supinate when I walk and while trying them on and walking around my living room, I was constantly walking on the outside of my feet from heel to toe.  These shoes are better for people without that problem.  If your feet pronate or over pronate, this shoe should be OK, although they don’t offer any arch support.  I also have a very high arch and high instep.  I need to buy wide widths in shoes for that reason.  These shoes were too tight for me across the instep. If you have normal feet this should not be a problem.  The soles on these shoes grip floor surfaces very well and should be good when walking on slippery surfaces. I tend to drag my feet when I walk (I’m on the north side of 70) and this was another problem for me.  In other comments, it is mentioned that they are a little on the long size.  If you wear a half size, it would probably be best to order a size smaller not bigger.  I wear a size 12 and probably could have gotten away with a size 11.But I still give them four stars for their price, looks and style.  I wish I could keep them, but my feet are what they are, and these shoes aren’t right for them.  Too bad that I have to return them. I hope this helps others in deciding on whether or not to give them a try.

评论概述: Excellent at the price and stylish too!
评论详情: I purchased a black pair on a hunch and was so pleasantly surprised that I bought a dark grey pair a few days later. Zero-drop shoes are most comfortable for me when exercising and for casual wear. In the past, I purchased Altras for both. Altra stopped making the simple black casual shoes. The newer model running shoes don't appeal to me. And both styles are overpriced at $120-$140. These feel great. They'll equal the short life of Altras, and they're suitable for casual business dress, all for significantly less money. The sizing is European, so if you're on the line (I'm between a 10-10.5, size up).

I love to be barefoot as much as possible and have worn several different kinds of barefoot shoes over the years. But for some reason always stuck with traditional shoes for hiking. These often left with with random numbness on different parts of my feet and a tendency to roll my ankles far too much. Well I was ready to start hiking again and decided it was time to try barefoot shoes, and these came up top of my search and I'm DELIGHTED. These are so comfortable and I feel so much more in control of my footing with them than I ever had with traditional hiking boots/shoes. I've only completed a couple of hikes so far, but I'm looking forward to more now that I know I can be much more pain free.

评论概述: Great shoes if they could get them to stay together
评论详情: The sole at the front of the toe box separates from the upper. Pictured is the 2nd (replacement) pair suffering from the same issue as the first pair ordered. Unfortunately, this pair barely made it through the return window so I'm stuck with them coming apart after only a couple months.
Love the minimalist design and styling colors!!

评论概述: Look better in pictures seem cheap like water shoes
评论详情: Seem cheap like water shoes

This is my first pair of minimalist / barefoot shoes. Before this, I had an expensive pair of name brand shoes that cost nearly $200. After I broke my ankle from running in them, I researched barefoot shoes and found these. I wanted something to mainly use for running / hiking trails. After 150 miles, these shoes are performing well. I took my time to transition wearing them, and initially only walked and jogged until my legs became adjusted. Now, I run in these all the time and even wear them casually since I like them so much. For the price, I am more than happy with how they’ve held up and honestly a bit surprised. I plan to order more once I need them. Overall, I highly recommend, especially for the price!
I purchased these shoes for my son, whose job has him on his feet all day, and he swears by them. Super comfortable and the black on black actually look like dress shoes.
The shoes were comfortable, however, the size advertised 10W was the same size as my current 9.5W. I needed the extra width due changes in my feet.

评论详情: They’re super comfortable, flexible and light weight. They are good for both lifting and walking on a treadmill. Great grip to floors and great quality so far

I really like these shoes. They’re well made, and very comfortable. There is plenty of room for my toes to splay out, although my feet are average width. Lots of ventilation, and lightweight. The sole is not super thin, but is very flexible and you can feel the ground pretty well. For me, it’s just the right amount of cushion. I wear a 10.5 in Nike and most other shoes, and a size 10.0/43 fits me perfectly.

I just recieved the shoes so this isn't an endurance review. I feel the shoes very confortable, very good materials and flexibility. The width is just as good as they mention, and the grip is awesome. They're very light and the size chart is very accurate. I'm very happy with my purchase so far. Will upgrade if anything negative shows up

This is my third pair of Whitin sneakers. At this low of a price they age very well, I'm talking two to three years of constant use and I've had to put a little super glue on a little gap along the soul and that's it. I recently got the bug to buy a pair of white sneakers and these were the obvious choice. They look great, the color contrast is fantastic and as with all other Whitin sneakers I've bought, they feel as comfy as slippers!

I never thought I would actually like barefoot shoes, but after trying a bunch of different ones, I decided to keep these and am very happy I did.  They are comfortable and provide good support.  Glad I got them!  I am now recommending them to people when they ask about them.

My forefoot is wide and these running shoes accommodate my feet well. I wore them two days for my part-time job and was on my feet most of the time. They are comfortable, flexible, with plenty of space to in the forefoot area. It was a good spend!!

Design is great  but the soles aren’t very strong. They definitely don’t do good on wet surfaces. A lot of room in the toe box area. Good for short distances. But after about 3 miles you’re gonna start to feel every step.

评论概述: There’s room for the piggy’s to breath, and they look cool!
评论详情: I also ordered them in white. I will be ordering more for work! Zero complaint on these shoes from me. My coworkers all told me they love the look!

They fit true to size,  look great,  and I'm getting healthier. My toes are spreading out and my feet and calves are getting stronger! I f you are new to barefoot shoes, go slow and ease into wearing them more and more over time.
